DOC.brief_summary: The researchers will investigate if brain insulin action influences peripheral insulin sensitivity in healthy humans.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Brain Insulin Sensitivity on Peripheral Insulin Sensitivity
DOC.criteria: BMI < 28 kg/m2 normal HbA1c healthy volunteers Heparin induced thrombocytopenia (HIT) metal implants cardial diseases anemia patients taking any kind of drugs
